scripts.build: npm run build-css-components && npm run build-css-pages && react-scripts build
scripts.watch-css-components: npm run build-css-components && node-sass-chokidar --include-path ./src --include-path ./node_modules src/components/ -o src/components/ --watch --recursive
scripts.watch-css-pages: npm run build-css-pages && node-sass-chokidar --include-path ./src --include-path ./node_modules src/pages/ -o src/pages/ --watch --recursive
